demoList.title: Black_light_White_light
demoList.description: Zumi can recognize simple colors. In this demo, we will control Zumi using black and white cards.

demoList.title: Face_recognition
demoList.description: Zumi can be trained to recognize your face! In this demo, we will give Zumi pictures of your face, have her train a model, and then run the model.

demoList.title: Smile_reaction
demoList.description: Zumi can read your emotions. Run this demo to see how she reacts to you being happy or sad.
